nodes.text: Suzal was a member of the Five. After kidnapping Han Solo, Chewbacca, and Princess Leia while they were traveling through the Hellhoop, Suzal was deciding whether or not to hold them for years or to just kill them. He sent Han and Leia to the dungeon and he chained Chewbacca to a wall. Han and Leia escaped and went to release Wutzek. He was subsequently killed by the Force-sensitive demon.
